name: Lavafall
description:
Lavafall

For Ludum Dare 50

'Delay the inevitable'

You're a robot sent to collect batteries from near the surface. Can you do it in time before the lava reaches?

Sorry for the lack of content in this one, had a hard time doing level design.

Controls

A, D, or arrow keys to move left and right

Space to jump

Q to throw batteries

E to drop batteries

R to reset

ESC to leave
